item.title: [RichScape] Still Got Shop Problems! [RichScape]
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

Ok Heres My Cases In Client.java

[code]//Shops
case 520:
Coords = true;
Shop = 1;
break;

		case 521:
			Coords = true;
			Shop = 2;
			break;
			
		case 522:
			Coords = true;
			Shop = 3;
			break;
		
		case 523:
			Coords = true;
			Shop = 4;
			break;
			
		case 524:
			Coords = true;
			Shop = 5;
			break;
			
		case 525:
			Coords = true;
			Shop = 6;
			break;
	//End Shops[/code]

Heres My AutoSpawn.cfg For The Shop.

//Edgeville shops spawn = 520 3094 3499 0 0 0 0 0 1 //Magic Store
And Heres My Shops.cfg

shop = 1 Zaff's Magic Store 2 2 562 1000 560 1000 554 1000 555 1000 556 1000 557 1000 558 1000 566 1000 3053 20 4089 20 4091 20 4093 20 4095 20 4097 20 2693 1 shop = 2 Combat Shop 2 2 1333 10 6528 10 4587 10 5698 10 3753 10 3751 10 3749 10 7610 10 1127 10 1079 10 1540 20 6524 20 379 2000 385 500 shop = 3 Skilling shop 2 2 227 1000 2428 50 113 50 2432 50 2446 50 4045 50 1436 1000 1777 1000 1623 5000 1621 4000 1619 3500 1617 3000 1631 2500 6571 1 1741 1000 1759 1000 1733 100 1734 10000 1275 100 1359 100 590 100 946 100 1755 100 2347 100 952 100 5341 100 954 100 314 10000 311 10 303 10 305 10 301 10 2552 50 shop = 4 Thessalia's Clothing 2 2 544 50 542 50 6109 50 6107 50 6108 50 6106 50 6110 50 6111 50 656 50 662 50 7458 50 7459 50 7460 50 3105 50 775 50 1837 50 shop = 5 Lowe's Archery 2 2 2503 10 2497 10 2501 10 2495 10 2499 10 2493 10 1135 10 1099 10 882 5000 884 5000 886 5000 857 100 853 100 7628 10 2687 1 shop = 6 SkillCapes 2 2 2678 1 2681 1 2684 1 2690 1 2696 1 2699 1 2702 1 2705 1 2708 1 2714 1 2717 1 2723 1 2726 1 2729 1 2732 1 2738 1 [ENDOFSHOPLIST]
Now My Problem Is That If You Look At Case 520, Its Shop 1. And Shop 1 Is The Mage Shop. But When I Compile And And Run The Shop Is My Skilling Shop, With Skilling Items In It. I Dont Understand Why Its Putting the Wrong Shop.

Read full topic
